data.text: @LALewman @angie_keathly why is Biden pushing “go back to the office”?
@LALewman @angie_keathly Russia invading the Ukraine have got nothing to do with the price of gas, the SANCTIONS DO - media pushing this lie down the throats of the public

@gracechurch64 @LALewman @HarryPotterMAGE Less demand would lower prices also. Companies across America should convert back to work from home, gas companies would have to adjust prices based on lower demand.

@LALewman @HarpersDranma It sounds to me your husband loves his job and is committed to it. I wouldn’t let an ignorant person who doesn’t understand hard work determination and dedication is. Some people just say things to make themselves relevant. I agree support Ukraine
@LALewman I have the same commute an hour and a half each way, and I suspect my agency will be asking us to come back soon

@LALewman Then it sound like you t so are NOT the smartest cookies in the box. Why the fuck would you live so far away from his work. I live one mile from my work and all the stores I need are between my work and home.
@LALewman hey we need your help!  lets start a 3 work day gas strike. pass the news along. Specially to truckers. You in?
@LALewman Did he drive that 3 hour commute before Covid?

@LALewman Agree! 
So many positives from our wallet to our environment. https://t.co/qRSMNuHqXI
@LALewman @HarryPotterMAGE Not just to avoid high gas prices--less traffic means less pollution & fewer accidents among other things.
